titulo: Oso No Para de Roncar [Bear Snores On]
descripcion:
En una cueva del bosque duerme el oso su siesta...y celebran otros la fiesta.
[In a cave in the woods, all winter long, Bear sleeps in his cozy lair. 
Surprise guests stop by to warm up, brew tea, and pop corn while Bear snores on. 
When the smells and the fun finally disturb his slumber, Bear wakes up to find his den full of celebrating critters.]
